SEARCH
Package Commands

Class AttackCardCommand

java.lang.Object
Commands.AttackCardCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameCommand
public class AttackCardCommand extends Object implements GameCommand
Command to facilitate an attack between two cards on the game board. This command handles the logic for attacking one card with another, applying spell effects, and updating the game state and visuals accordingly.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AttackCardCommand(CardView attacker, CardView target, GameManager gameManager, GameScene gameScene)
    Constructs an AttackCardCommand with specified attacker and target cards, along with references to the game manager and game scene to manage game state and UI updates.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    execute(TaskStatus taskStatus)
    Executes the attack operation between the attacker and target cards.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • AttackCardCommand

      public AttackCardCommand(CardView attacker, CardView target, GameManager gameManager, GameScene gameScene)
      Constructs an AttackCardCommand with specified attacker and target cards, along with references to the game manager and game scene to manage game state and UI updates.
      Parameters:
      attacker - the card view representing the attacking card
      target - the card view representing the defending card
      gameManager - the game manager to handle game logic and state
      gameScene - the game scene to update visual components after the attack

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(TaskStatus taskStatus)
      Executes the attack operation between the attacker and target cards. Manages damage calculation, mana costs, and updates the visual and game state aspects such as board, graveyard, hand displays, and mana labels.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface GameCommand
      Parameters:
      taskStatus - status object to update with results of the attack, such as changes in the number of spell cards
